Field Documentation

u32 alt_dma_descriptor::control

reserved (padding)

u32 alt_dma_descriptor::length

The writeaddress register specifies the first location to be written in a DMA

u32 alt_dma_descriptor::read_address

The status register consists of individual bits that indicate conditions inside the DMA

u32 alt_dma_descriptor::reserved_1

Specifies the number of bytes to transfer from the read port to the write port. The length register is specified in bytes.

u32 alt_dma_descriptor::reserved_2

reserved (padding)

u32 alt_dma_descriptor::reserved_3

The control register is composed of individual bits that control the DMA internal operation. The control register value can be read at any time.

u32 alt_dma_descriptor::status

Specifies the address of data to be read. This address is set to 0 if the input interface is an Avalon-ST interface.

Referenced by AltSpecsV2_isr().

u32 alt_dma_descriptor::write_address

The readaddress register specifies the first location to be read in a DMA transaction
